item.title: React-Based Investor Relations Website
item.description: Overview A modern React.js Investor Relations (IR) website for corporate financial reporting, regulatory disclosures, and investor communications. Features Dynamic pages generated using JSON routing Reusable components for results, financial statements, filings API integrated for disclosures such as: Annual Reports Earnings Releases Press Announcements SEO-ready & mobile-optimized layout Light and fast UI using modern React hooks Responsibilities Architected the full UI component system Implemented routing using JSON-driven configuration Integrated with backend IR API Created reusable templates for financial widgets Tech Stack React.
